## Enumerations

<a id="enum_WebRTCDataChannel_WriteMode"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration -->

enum **WriteMode**: [ðŸ”—](#enum_WebRTCDataChannel_WriteMode)

<a id="WebRTCDataChannel_constant_WRITE_MODE_TEXT"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[WriteMode](WebRTCDataChannel.md#enum_WebRTCDataChannel_WriteMode) **WRITE_MODE_TEXT** = `0`

Tells the channel to send data over this channel as text. An external peer (non-Godot) would receive this as a string.<a id="WebRTCDataChannel_constant_WRITE_MODE_BINARY"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[WriteMode](WebRTCDataChannel.md#enum_WebRTCDataChannel_WriteMode) **WRITE_MODE_BINARY** = `1`

Tells the channel to send data over this channel as binary. An external peer (non-Godot) would receive this as array buffer or blob.<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="enum_WebRTCDataChannel_ChannelState"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration -->

enum **ChannelState**: [ðŸ”—](#enum_WebRTCDataChannel_ChannelState)

<a id="WebRTCDataChannel_constant_STATE_CONNECTING"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[ChannelState](WebRTCDataChannel.md#enum_WebRTCDataChannel_ChannelState) **STATE_CONNECTING** = `0`

The channel was created, but it's still trying to connect.<a id="WebRTCDataChannel_constant_STATE_OPEN"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[ChannelState](WebRTCDataChannel.md#enum_WebRTCDataChannel_ChannelState) **STATE_OPEN** = `1`

The channel is currently open, and data can flow over it.<a id="WebRTCDataChannel_constant_STATE_CLOSING"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[ChannelState](WebRTCDataChannel.md#enum_WebRTCDataChannel_ChannelState) **STATE_CLOSING** = `2`

The channel is being closed, no new messages will be accepted, but those already in queue will be flushed.<a id="WebRTCDataChannel_constant_STATE_CLOSED"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[ChannelState](WebRTCDataChannel.md#enum_WebRTCDataChannel_ChannelState) **STATE_CLOSED** = `3`

The channel was closed, or connection failed.<hr class="classref-section-separator"/>

<!-- classref-descriptions-group -->

## Property Descriptions

<a id="WebRTCDataChannel_property_write_mode"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[WriteMode](WebRTCDataChannel.md#enum_WebRTCDataChannel_WriteMode) **write_mode** = `1` [ðŸ”—](#WebRTCDataChannel_property_write_mode)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_write_mode**\ (\ value\: [WriteMode](WebRTCDataChannel.md#enum_WebRTCDataChannel_WriteMode)\ )
- [WriteMode](WebRTCDataChannel.md#enum_WebRTCDataChannel_WriteMode) **get_write_mode**\ (\ )

The transfer mode to use when sending outgoing packet. Either text or binary.

<hr class="classref-section-separator"/>

<!-- classref-descriptions-group -->

## Method Descriptions

<a id="WebRTCDataChannel_method_close"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **close**\ (\ ) [ðŸ”—](#WebRTCDataChannel_method_close)

Closes this data channel, notifying the other peer.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="WebRTCDataChannel_method_get_buffered_amount"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[int](int.md) **get_buffered_amount**\ (\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#WebRTCDataChannel_method_get_buffered_amount)

Returns the number of bytes currently queued to be sent over this channel.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="WebRTCDataChannel_method_get_id"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[int](int.md) **get_id**\ (\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#WebRTCDataChannel_method_get_id)

Returns the ID assigned to this channel during creation (or auto-assigned during negotiation).

If the channel is not negotiated out-of-band the ID will only be available after the connection is established (will return ``65535`` until then).

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="WebRTCDataChannel_method_get_label"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[String](String.md) **get_label**\ (\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#WebRTCDataChannel_method_get_label)

Returns the label assigned to this channel during creation.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="WebRTCDataChannel_method_get_max_packet_life_time"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[int](int.md) **get_max_packet_life_time**\ (\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#WebRTCDataChannel_method_get_max_packet_life_time)

Returns the ``maxPacketLifeTime`` value assigned to this channel during creation.

Will be ``65535`` if not specified.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="WebRTCDataChannel_method_get_max_retransmits"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[int](int.md) **get_max_retransmits**\ (\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#WebRTCDataChannel_method_get_max_retransmits)

Returns the ``maxRetransmits`` value assigned to this channel during creation.

Will be ``65535`` if not specified.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="WebRTCDataChannel_method_get_protocol"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[String](String.md) **get_protocol**\ (\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#WebRTCDataChannel_method_get_protocol)

Returns the sub-protocol assigned to this channel during creation. An empty string if not specified.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="WebRTCDataChannel_method_get_ready_state"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[ChannelState](WebRTCDataChannel.md#enum_WebRTCDataChannel_ChannelState) **get_ready_state**\ (\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#WebRTCDataChannel_method_get_ready_state)

Returns the current state of this channel.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="WebRTCDataChannel_method_is_negotiated"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[bool](bool.md) **is_negotiated**\ (\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#WebRTCDataChannel_method_is_negotiated)

Returns ``true`` if this channel was created with out-of-band configuration.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="WebRTCDataChannel_method_is_ordered"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[bool](bool.md) **is_ordered**\ (\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#WebRTCDataChannel_method_is_ordered)

Returns ``true`` if this channel was created with ordering enabled (default).

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="WebRTCDataChannel_method_poll"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[Error](@GlobalScope.md#enum_@GlobalScope_Error) **poll**\ (\ ) [ðŸ”—](#WebRTCDataChannel_method_poll)

Reserved, but not used for now.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="WebRTCDataChannel_method_was_string_packet"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[bool](bool.md) **was_string_packet**\ (\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#WebRTCDataChannel_method_was_string_packet)

Returns ``true`` if the last received packet was transferred as text. See [write_mode](WebRTCDataChannel.md#WebRTCDataChannel_property_write_mode).
